parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:
- zh: Chinese
- en: English

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end time of the monitoring data.   
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

parameters.name: FilterCondition
parameters.description: All parameters are referenced by the symbol @. For a list of available parameters, refer to the returned parameters in [Query performance indicators of an SQL statement](https://en.oceanbase.com/docs/community-ocp-en-10000000000840290).

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
Page size.
- Start value: 1
- Default value: 1

parameters.name: SearchRule
parameters.description:
The search rule.   
Valid values: "=", ">", ">=", "<", and "<="

parameters.name: SqlTextLength
parameters.description: Max length of the returned SQL text.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The start time of the monitoring data.   
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.
